prompt: Photorealistic close-up of a shattered glass sculpture of a human heart, lying on a velvet surface. prompt: Wide, panoramic shot of a desolate landscape, resembling a cracked earth desert. In the foreground, a single, partially buried, abstract sculpture made of fragmented mirrors reflects the setting sun. The mirrors cast distorted and fragmented images of the surrounding landscape. Golden hour lighting, creating long shadows and a sense of decay. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 5

prompt: An overhead, studio shot of a canvas covered in irregularly shaped, painted paper fragments, each representing a different value of gray, ranging from pure white to deep black. name: shattered-value-art-image-3.png

prompt: A macro photograph of a single, shattered ceramic tile. The tile fragment features a complex pattern of cracks and fissures, revealing the inner layers of the material. name: shattered-value-art-image-4.png

prompt: A hyperrealistic rendering of a mosaic artwork depicting a cityscape. The mosaic is made of irregular, shattered pieces of colored glass, arranged to create a vibrant and dynamic image.
